game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've received a clue that leads you to believe the lost artifact is hidden within an abandoned city. Your quest is to navigate the treacherous ruins, uncover its location, and bring it back.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a magical relic

task.description: Make your way through the dense jungle to reach the entrance of the forgotten city.
Search the ruins for any signs or clues that might lead you to the hidden artifact.
